first_para: Samuel "Sammy" Wilson (born 4 April 1953) is a British politician from Northern Ireland who is a member of parliament (MP) and a Member of the Legislative Assembly (MLA) for East Antrim. He served as Lord Mayor of Belfast in 1986 – 1987; and again from June 2000 to June 2001. He was the first person from the Democratic Unionist Party (DUP) to hold the office. He previously served as Minister of Finance and Personnel and Minister of the Environment in the Northern Ireland Executive.

full.extract:
Samuel "Sammy" Wilson (born 4 April 1953) is a British politician from Northern Ireland who is a member of parliament (MP) and a Member of the Legislative Assembly (MLA) for East Antrim. He served as Lord Mayor of Belfast in 1986 – 1987; and again from June 2000 to June 2001. He was the first person from the Democratic Unionist Party (DUP) to hold the office. He previously served as Minister of Finance and Personnel and Minister of the Environment in the Northern Ireland Executive.
^ Northern Ireland Assembly Information Office. "Ministers and their Departments, Northern Ireland Assembly". Niassembly.gov.uk. Retrieved 29 January 2011. 
^ http://www.ukwhoswho.com/view/article/oupww/whoswho/U40310/
^ Northern Ireland Assembly Information Office (1 July 1998). "Northern Ireland Assembly Report Wednesday July 1, 1999". Niassembly.gov.uk. Retrieved 29 January 2011.
full.title: Sammy Wilson
